plot: Andres works as a draughtman, but what he really likes is drawing. Daniela looks for a drawer in order to illustrate the pornographic stories she writes.
title: Algo que aprender
plot_es: Andres works as a draughtman, but what he really likes is drawing. Daniela looks for a drawer in order to illustrate the pornographic stories she writes.
plot_en: Andres works as a draughtman, but what he really likes is drawing. Daniela looks for a drawer in order to illustrate the pornographic stories she writes.
